A

Account - Class in Unnamed Package
This class represents the account model of the program, it contains the data field name and password, so that it could be used for registration and login purposes
Account() - Constructor for class Account
No-arg constructor
Account(String, String) - Constructor for class Account
Constructs an account with a name and a password
AccountManagement - Class in Unnamed Package
A class created to manage account, capable of registering a new NGO/Donor account, login to an existing NGO/Donor account.
AccountManagement() - Constructor for class AccountManagement
 
Aid - Class in Unnamed Package
This class represents the aid model, that contains the data fields name, quantity, donor, ngo, and status
Aid() - Constructor for class Aid
No-arg constructor
Aid(String, int, String, String, String) - Constructor for class Aid
Constructs an aid object

Distribution - Class in Unnamed Package
This class represents the aids that has been donated, requested, and distributed in our distribution system, to be displayed for users
Distribution() - Constructor for class Distribution
No-arg constructor
Distribution(String, String, String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class Distribution
Constructs an distribution object that contains all the non-sensitive information about an aid that has been entered into the distribution system
DistributionCenter - Class in Unnamed Package
A class representing the distribution center, capable of distributing the newly added aids.
DistributionCenter() - Constructor for class DistributionCenter
No-arg constructor
DistributionCenter(File, File, File) - Constructor for class DistributionCenter
Constructs a DistributionCenter object with the all the files as its data fields, so that it can be used to updating the database.
DistributionCollector - Class in Unnamed Package
This class represents the collection simulation for all reserved aids in the distribution system.
DistributionCollector() - Constructor for class DistributionCollector
No-arg constructor
DistributionCollector(File, File) - Constructor for class DistributionCollector
Constructs a DistributionCollector object that contains the distribution file as its data field, so that it can be used to simulate the collection sequence
DistributionView - Class in Unnamed Package
A class that is used for extracting out every single aid that has been donated, requested, or distributed
DistributionView() - Constructor for class DistributionView
No-arg constructor
DistributionView(File, File, File) - Constructor for class DistributionView
Constructs a distributionView object with all the files as its data fields, so that it can be used to updating the database.
